verses.name: 2 Kings 4:16
verses.text: And he said, About this season, according to the time of life, thou shalt embrace a son. And she said, Nay, my lord, thou man of God, do not lie unto thine handmaid.

verses.name: 2 Kings 4:17
verses.text: And the woman conceived, and bare a son at that season that Elisha had said unto her, according to the time of life.

verses.name: 2 Kings 4:18
verses.text: And when the child was grown, it fell on a day, that he went out to his father to the reapers.

verses.name: 2 Kings 4:19
verses.text: And he said unto his father, My head, my head. And he said to a lad, Carry him to his mother.
